Title: One Day in August
Actors: Eleni Kastani, Akilas Karazisis, Amalia Moutoussi, Emilios Chilakis
Plot: Middle August in Athens. Three families, living in a three storey building, leave for their summer vacations. Everyone is wishing for a miracle to happen this summer. In the meantime, a drifter breaks into their apartments and rummages their personal belongings, thus unfolding hidden secrets.
